## MultidimensionalPlot.(constructor)

The constructor of MultidimensionalPlot

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(div: HTMLElement, dp: DataProvider, compositionToPosition: ICompositionToPositionProvider);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  div | HTMLElement | The container that will include all graphical elements |
|  dp | [DataProvider](./composition-plot.dataprovider.md) | The DataProvider with the samples and figures of merit |
|  compositionToPosition | [ICompositionToPositionProvider](./composition-plot.icompositiontopositionprovider.md) | The object in charge of determining the position of the samples in 3D |
